text_block_list.text:
The morning after the emotional Arima Kinen, 
Team Sirius embarks on a new chapter…
What do you mean the team is going to be disbanded!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: It started with a scream from Mejiro McQueen.

The truth of the matter is, all of the other members have 
transferred to different teams. McQueen-san, you're the only 
one left on this team.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
This team unfortunately doesn't have the minimum 
required number of members anymore.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
So unless more members join, 
this team will have to be disbanded.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
I can't believe that, in one night, our team became a shell of 
its former self! You are all so heartless!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: Hey, first let's try to calm down
Hey, first let's try to calm down

text_block_list.text: How can you be so calm?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Despite the fact that the team 
you inherited may be disbanded!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Tazuna-san, will our team be disbanded immediately?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
No, since this is the first time something like this has 
happened, we wouldn't suddenly force you to disband…
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
That being said, this is only a temporary postponement. I don't 
know how much time you have, but I'll be speaking with the 
school's management about it.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
choice_data_list: <size=42>So, regardless, we need to hurry, huh?</size>

text_block_list.text:
That's correct. I know it must be hard to be put in this kind of 
situation immediately after inheriting the team…
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
Hmph! You'll see! I'll find more 
team members in no time!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
I'm an Uma Musume of the Mejiro family. Taking care of something 
like this will be a piece of cake!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
We're currently recruiting new members! 
Let's work hard together!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Even those that have yet to win races are welcome! 
Our team is like a second family!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Freshly harvested carrots at a bargain price! 
They're quite cheap!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
And if you act now, you can become 
a member of Team Sirius as a bonus! 
Hey, you over there! Are you interested!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Why is it that, despite someone such as I doing the recruiting, 
not a single person has shown any interest!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
To be fair, I don't think people would want to join a team with 
an inexperienced trainer. Especially when almost all of that 
team's members left at once.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
To be fair, I don't think people would want to join a team with 
an inexperienced trainer. Especially when almost all of that 
team's members left at once.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Why are you standing there and analyzing this 
so calmly!? Have a sense of urgency!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Trust me, I'm worried too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Trust me, I'm worried too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
He believed in me and entrusted this team 
to me. I can't betray his expectations.

He believed in me and entrusted this team 
to me. I can't betray his expectations.

That being said, if we continue to recruit while Team 
Sirius is in such a sorry state, I don't think we'll 
be able to get any new members to join.

We have to think of a new strategy that'll 
entice Uma Musume to join our team…

Well anyways, I think we should call 
it a day here and begin our training.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Well anyways, I think we should call 
it a day here and begin our training.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: …You're right.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
I've been prioritizing the wrong things by focusing 
on recruitment. I'll go get ready!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Our next race is happening at the end of April. It will be the 
Spring Tennō Shō, a 3200 meter long distance race.

Our next race is happening at the end of April. It will be the 
Spring Tennō Shō, a 3200 meter long distance race.

Since this race will be an incredible test of endurance, I 
recommended that she work on her form.

Since this race will be an incredible test of endurance, I 
recommended that she work on her form.
Hah… Ha… Ueh…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
At the end of the corner, make sure to be conscious of which foot 
you're kicking off with. You should be kicking off harder with 
your left foot, rather than your right.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Okay, understood.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Okay, do 3 more laps around the track, 
then we can call it a day.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Okay, do 3 more laps around the track, 
then we can call it a day.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: …Only 3 more laps?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
You're still working on your form, so I'm worried that it might 
be putting a heavy strain on your body and mind. We need to make 
sure you aren't pushing yourself too hard.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
You're still working on your form, so I'm worried that it might 
be putting a heavy strain on your body and mind. We need to make 
sure you aren't pushing yourself too hard.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: …I see. I didn't think about that.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
If you're unsatisfied, please let me know. 
I wouldn't want to push anything onto you after all.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
If you're unsatisfied, please let me know. 
I wouldn't want to push anything onto you after all.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
No, what you said makes sense. 
So I have no complaints.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: With that, she went back to the track.

As I watched her, she seemed to be a 
little bit upset with only doing 3 laps.
I guess she really wasn't convinced, huh?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
When compared to Sensei's training, mine is probably 
lacking somewhere… Or maybe her and I have yet 
to build a trusting relationship…

My ability to manage a team is still lacking, and it would be 
great if we could find more members.
choice_data_list: But we'll definitely get through this!

text_block_list.text:
My ability to manage a team is still lacking, and it would be 
great if we could find more members.
choice_data_list: But we'll definitely get through this!

text_block_list.text: Thinking about this got me fired up.
Thinking about this got me fired up.
